definition[0]: used to add new information to what you have just said, to give your opinion, or to start a new conversation
example[0]: I’ve known Barbara for years. Since we were babies, actually.
example[1]: Actually, on second thoughts, I don’t think I want to go out tonight.
definition[1]: used to emphasize the real or exact truth of a situation, rather than what people may think
example[2]: What time are you actually leaving?
